function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased probability of virus transmission due to high occupant density","Impact":"Higher risk of virus transmission and spread within buildings","Mitigation":"Implement social distancing measures and reduce occupant density","Technologies":"Occupancy sensors, space utilization software, and biometric access control systems","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Virus transmission through surfaces and human-building interactions","Impact":"Potential exposure to virus particles through contact with building surfaces","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of frequently touched surfaces, implementation of touchless technologies","Technologies":"UV-C disinfection systems, touchless door openers, voice-activated controls","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Uncertainty about virus transmission via surfaces and the effectiveness of prevention measures","Impact":"Lack of clear guidelines for building design and operation to prevent virus transmission","Mitigation":"Continued research and collaboration to develop best practices for building design and operation","Technologies":"Sensors for monitoring surface contamination, air quality sensors, and predictive modeling for virus spread","People":"Health experts, building designers, and researchers","Owner":"Public health organizations"}]}
